input_text:
Job Title: Account Executive

Location: Greater Boston

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Account Executive – This role is Hybrid, located in the 02110 zip code within the Greater Boston Area.
Why us?
Be part of a small, supportive team in a growing company with great leadership (we don’t just say it, we are it)! Prosum is on the Best Places to Work and Top Staffing Companies to Work for lists! Prosum’s culture is entrepreneurial, and our employees love the ability to structure their own hours, work remotely, and have uncapped earning potential! We strive to continually add fans to the Prosum community through our boutique approach to staffing. This human-first focus is what attracts candidates and clients alike to build long-term partnerships. We are a nationally certified minority-owned business through the Southern California Minority Supplier Development Council (NMSDC).
Check out our website and hear from our employees in their own words what it’s like to work with us:Testimonials
Why work here?
have an entrepreneurial spirit and are looking for your tribe!have a supportive leadership team that will invest in your growth and careerwant to work with a senior and tenured team that has strong tech industry knowledge and a passion for working in a boutique agencywant to make an impact with an organization and have your voice heardtruly believe in a healthy work-life balance
What’s in it for you?
efforts determine your earnings! We have a competitive compensation package ($50K-$75K depending on experience) with a best-in-class, uncapped commission structure.offer open and flexible vacations, no accruals, and no caps, we want our employees to take time off to recharge!believe in recognizing you for doing great work with monthly and quarterly recognition and reward incentives.yearly, all-company beach day in Los Angeles!top performers and their guests get to take an all-expenses paid, 4-day, 3-night trip every year to an exciting location!path and growth support provided at all levels!technology & industry traininghave great benefits (Medical, Dental, & Vision), a 401k plan, Maternity Leave and Parental leave

What will you do?
a client pipeline through lead generation. You will be responsible for identifying, managing, and maintaining client relationships through business development and growing existing business.the Prosum value/solution/brand. Companies are struggling to retain top talent and you will become the expert in uncovering challenges that our prospective clients face. You will show clients how Prosum can solve their challenges, address their concerns, and help them grow their company.expect you to drive gross profit growth, by studying and navigating the customer buying process, engaging internal and external key stakeholders, and ultimately securing a signed agreement.the entire job order lifecycle, from conducting an intake call, reviewing internal submissions, and coordinating interviews to closing candidates.
Is this you?
have been in a similar role within a staffing agency for more than two years and are an experienced and results-oriented Account Executive who is well-connected, passionate, and enthusiastic about the tech world.are in tune with the latest staffing trends, have a hunter attitude, and can help us add more fans to our Prosum community!describe yourself as eager, proactive, resourceful, and able to keep a cool head under pressure.are a natural at building strong internal relationships with our delivery team and externally with our clients.you have a strong understanding of the staffing industry and sales experience.effortlessly drive sales strategy and planning, with prospective and established clients to generate a pipeline while consistently achieving individual performance metrics and sales targets.IT network is solid!a natural ability to assess client staffing needs and plans, write complete job orders, and appropriately match permanent and/or temporary candidates to meet client requirements and expectations.time management and prioritization skills are one of your super-strengths!to communicate in a remote environment with excellent written and verbal skills including, interviewing, influencing, negotiating, and collaborating.and exceed individual performance goals and gross profit targets.to engage with ‘the hustle’ of an entrepreneurial team.are experienced in inputting, updating, maintaining, and documenting client and candidate communication and activity progress.
Prosum is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
Your Right to Work 
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S. In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Account Executive
output_json.summary: Hybrid role in Greater Boston area with a focus on business development and sales.
output_json.company_information: Prosum is a nationally certified minority-owned business with a focus on staffing services. They are known for their boutique approach, strong tech industry knowledge, and commitment to a healthy work-life balance. They are recognized for being a great place to work and have a strong emphasis on employee engagement and growth.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Prosum is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate against any applicant based on race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
